fr.epita.quiz.datamodel

Class Question

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.epita.quiz.datamodel.Question
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    QuestionI
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Associative, MultipleChoice, Open

    public abstract class Question
extends java.lang.Object
implements QuestionI
    Base class for quiz questions. Extended for multiple choice, open-ended, and associative questions
    Author:
    Jonathan Sadighian and Rhea Moubarak
